description: This file provides utility functions and classes to configure and establish a connection to a SQLite database, including reading configuration from a specific file path and parsing connection strings. It defines a configuration data class, helper functions to locate repository root and extract file paths, and public functions to get database configurations and connections.

classes.name: SqliteConfig
classes.description: Immutable data class holding the SQLite database file path.

methods.name: Path _repo_root_from_this_file()
methods.description: Determines the root directory of the repository by navigating upward from this file's location.

methods.name: Optional[str] _extract_sqlite_file_path(db_connection_txt: str)
methods.description: Parses a string containing connection info to extract the SQLite database file path.

methods.name: SqliteConfig get_sqlite_config()
methods.description: Reads the database connection configuration from a file and returns a configured SqliteConfig object.

methods.name: sqlite3.Connection get_connection()
methods.description: Creates and returns a sqlite3.Connection object based on the configuration.
